game.title: The Lost Artifact Quest
game.objective: Retrieve the Ancient Relic from Amara's Hut
game.description: A quest from the wise Old Sage, seek out the Relic hidden within her hut. Beware the mysteries that hide there.

task.description: East of the village, follow the path marked by the Oak Trees. She resides within.
Explore Amara's hut, solve its riddles, and locate the hidden Relic in her library.

task.objective: Return the Relic to Old Sage Amara
task.description: Bring the Relic back to her and witness her joy at your success.
